channel.title: [$] EmpireScape 24/7 Anti DDos @Searching For Staff Team [$]
channel.description:
Hi Guys We Setup An server Same source like Roatpkz: Www.empire-scape.com Www.empire-scape.com & Www.empire-scape.com & Www.empire-scape.com
@ Still searching for an good staff team ! @ Advertise for donator rank! @ Custom items like Angel cape, Death cape, And alot more ( 63 Customs )
[img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/7876/d3a5a0d70f214d13a0e3366.png[/img][img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/223/7a6410dbf7594ea8904d8ec.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AjDNv.png[/img] [img]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/5224/a16ada00a7d84be69b12c05.png[/img] [img]http://img807.imageshack.us/img807/7167/tabs.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/n6Hwe5D.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LLbtDxd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qoE59vw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HOdUdXo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nOAXt.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hIhJs.png[/img] [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/64/79153668.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FcFx7.jpg[/img]
About
Empire-Scape is a fun server, where you can basically login and PK straight away! On Empire-Scape, you have the option to spawn items, as well as having the option to change your levels and stats! Whether you are a experienced PKer or if you just started PKng, Empire-Scape is the right server for you! This server is filled with content and it's enjoyable! There are always people PKing, so why not join in the fun? We have a nice and friendly community, and at Empire-Scape, you can become one of the best PKers! There is no other place like Empire-Scape. The home for this server is Edgeville. Empire-Scape is a unique server due to the fact that we have a friendly and charming community. Empire-Scape has the potential to be one of the best servers in history, it's just we need more players! There are many PK hotspots scattered around everywhere in Empire-Scape, ranging from Mage Bank, Edgeville, Ice Plateau and many more places! Empire-Scape has been up for a very long time. At one stage, Empire-Scape hit a personal best of 140 players on at one time! Why not give Empire-Scape a chance? I can guarantee you will love the server! We are more than a server, we are a family.
Why should I join?
Why shouldn't you join, is the question you should be asking yourself! Empire-Scape is a fun enjoyable server where you can always PK, no matter what! The server is packed with content, and this server is not buggy! There are professional staffs on this server that will always help you. The second you log in, you can automatically PK. You can gear up in less than 20 seconds here on Empire-Scape! There is no lag on this server, and this server is 24/7. This server is based on PKing and staking. You don't have to be good at it! You can learn it all here on Empire-Scape. So what are you waiting for! Click the "Play Now" button at the top of this thread!
Features Vote4PKP & Accumulate Vote Points for Loyalty Titles. Professional Staff Team. Staff team are all mature, non-abusive, active and dedicated 20mb cache Automatic donation system with special perks in-game Flawless PKing. PK to your hearts content! Gear up in less than 30 seconds A special tab, where you can easily spawn sets of items, including Barrows and other supplies Hotkeys for ease of access 100% Rocktail and Overload effects. 2006 PK Oldschool Zone 100% Magic, which includes Lunar spells, ancient spells and normal spells Perfect Switching - Hybrid/Tribrid as you please PKP shop, that holds many items that are special! Fully working Duel Arena - stake your rare items! Spawn Commands, as well as Master, Pure, Zerker & Tank commands! No lag, and the server is 24/7! Strong VPS! Custom Capes for the donators with special effects; Dragon, Water and Earth Cape, each with bonuses. Imbued Rings; Warrior Ring(i), Berserker Ring (i), Archer Ring(i) and Seers Ring(i) Webclient and a Downloadable Client! FunPK - a place where you can PK as much as you want, without losing your items! Master Zone - a place where only players with 1,000 Kills can enter; including boxing zone! All Set Effects work (e.g. Dharoks Set) x1 and x10 hits, as well as Zoom in and Zoom out buttons! 10 Seconds Countdown Timer, after you leave the Wilderness!
We hopedfully see u around ;)

item.title: [$] EmpireScape 24/7 Anti DDos @Searching For Staff Team [$]
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:3, topic:539182”][quote author=furyking50 link=topic=658015.msg4401538#msg4401538 date=1390765989]
Overloadx source
Uhh why does the server have 2 names…
[/quote]

It’s a roat-pkz remake I’m assuming, not Overload. The photos are of the original one that gained a lot of players. There are quite a few remakes out there of this source, most of which fail. Assuming this one is among those failures since he can’t even use his own photos.[/quote]
Same shit

Read full topic
item.source: [$] EmpireScape 24/7 Anti DDos @Searching For Staff Team [$]

item.title: [$] EmpireScape 24/7 Anti DDos @Searching For Staff Team [$]
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“furyking50, post:2, topic:539182”]Overloadx source
Uhh why does the server have 2 names…[/quote]

It’s a roat-pkz remake I’m assuming, not Overload. The photos are of the original one that gained a lot of players. There are quite a few remakes out there of this source, most of which fail. Assuming this one is among those failures since he can’t even use his own photos.

item.description:
@sicksane1994 wrote:

Hi Guys We Setup An server Same source like Roatpkz: Www.empire-scape.com
Www.empire-scape.com & Www.empire-scape.com & Www.empire-scape.com

@ Still searching for an good staff team !
@ Advertise for donator rank!
@ Custom items like Angel cape, Death cape, And alot more ( 63 Customs )












About

Empire-Scape is a fun server, where you can basically login and PK straight away! On Empire-Scape, you have the option to spawn items, as well as having the option to change your levels and stats! Whether you are a experienced PKer or if you just started PKng, Empire-Scape is the right server for you! This server is filled with content and it’s enjoyable! There are always people PKing, so why not join in the fun? We have a nice and friendly community, and at Empire-Scape, you can become one of the best PKers! There is no other place like Empire-Scape. The home for this server is Edgeville. Empire-Scape is a unique server due to the fact that we have a friendly and charming community. Empire-Scape has the potential to be one of the best servers in history, it’s just we need more players! There are many PK hotspots scattered around everywhere in Empire-Scape, ranging from Mage Bank, Edgeville, Ice Plateau and many more places! Empire-Scape has been up for a very long time. At one stage, Empire-Scape hit a personal best of 140 players on at one time! Why not give Empire-Scape a chance? I can guarantee you will love the server! We are more than a server, we are a family.

Why should I join?

Why shouldn’t you join, is the question you should be asking yourself! Empire-Scape is a fun enjoyable server where you can always PK, no matter what! The server is packed with content, and this server is not buggy! There are professional staffs on this server that will always help you. The second you log in, you can automatically PK. You can gear up in less than 20 seconds here on Empire-Scape! There is no lag on this server, and this server is 24/7. This server is based on PKing and staking. You don’t have to be good at it! You can learn it all here on Empire-Scape. So what are you waiting for! Click the “Play Now” button at the top of this thread!

Features
Vote4PKP & Accumulate Vote Points for Loyalty Titles.
Professional Staff Team. Staff team are all mature, non-abusive, active and dedicated
20mb cache
Automatic donation system with special perks in-game
Flawless PKing. PK to your hearts content! Gear up in less than 30 seconds
A special tab, where you can easily spawn sets of items, including Barrows and other supplies
Hotkeys for ease of access
100% Rocktail and Overload effects.
2006 PK Oldschool Zone
100% Magic, which includes Lunar spells, ancient spells and normal spells
Perfect Switching - Hybrid/Tribrid as you please
PKP shop, that holds many items that are special!
Fully working Duel Arena - stake your rare items!
Spawn Commands, as well as Master, Pure, Zerker & Tank commands!
No lag, and the server is 24/7! Strong VPS!
Custom Capes for the donators with special effects; Dragon, Water and Earth Cape, each with bonuses.
Imbued Rings; Warrior Ring(i), Berserker Ring (i), Archer Ring(i) and Seers Ring(i)
Webclient and a Downloadable Client!
FunPK - a place where you can PK as much as you want, without losing your items!
Master Zone - a place where only players with 1,000 Kills can enter; including boxing zone!
All Set Effects work (e.g. Dharoks Set)
x1 and x10 hits, as well as Zoom in and Zoom out buttons!
10 Seconds Countdown Timer, after you leave the Wilderness!

We hopedfully see u around
